title: [Question]Does Ring Road campus has treadmill in gym
content: EC campus has some really good gym equipment and cardio facilities ,does the Ring Road campus also have a stationary cycle and treadmill??

comments.body: Broski they have around 5-6 cycles and 10-12 treadmills. They have a whole floor dedicated to cardio. By far one of the best college gyms I have seen in blr
Use this [Link](https://youtu.be/ceEJI7hYXT0?si=QN8HCbxm91EzoOQa) to see the gym tour, watch the end part, they showed the full cardio section as well.
Bruh RR gym is spacious and spreads across two floors, you get all the equipments you want
